html.p: Data Collection: The fortigate_event, fortigate_utm, and fortigate_traffic sourcetypes are necessary to collect firewall data via the Fortinet FortiGate Add-On for Splunk.

search.query: `cs_fortigate` sourcetype="fortigate_utm" | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_fortigate` sourcetype=\"fortigate_utm\"" | append [| search `cs_fortigate` sourcetype="fortigate_traffic" | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_fortigate` sourcetype=\"fortigate_traffic\""] | append [| search `cs_fortigate` sourcetype="fortigate_event" | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_fortigate` sourcetype=\"fortigate_event\""] | table label, data

format.colorPalette: {"Data Present": #03991a, "Data Not Present": #a3030b, "Report is enabled": #03991a, "Report is disabled": #a3030b}

search.query: `cs_fortigate` sourcetype IN ("fortigate_utm", "fortigate_traffic", "fortigate_event") | stats values(devid) as devid, values(sourcetype) as sourcetype, values(host) as host by dvc

`cs_fortigate` sourcetype="fortigate_event" subtype="user" vendor_action="authentication" vendor_status="failure" | stats values(src) as Source, values(dvc) as dvc, latest(_time) as LastLoginTime, count by user | `cs_human_readable_time_format(LastLoginTime)` | sort - count

html.p: Description: Fortigate firewall login failures by users.

search.query: `cs_fortigate` sourcetype IN ("fortigate_utm", "fortigate_event") | dedup dvc | table dvc
`cs_fortigate` sourcetype IN ("fortigate_utm", "fortigate_event") | dedup subtype | table subtype

`cs_fortigate` sourcetype="fortigate_utm" $tkn_threat_severity$ dvc=$tkn_threat_fortigate_device|s$ $tkn_threat_logsubtype$ $tkn_threat_search|s$ | rename srccountry as src_location, dstcountry as dest_location, signature as threat | table dvc, _time, subtype, severity, category, threat, msg, action, app, src, src_port, src_location, src_zone, dest, dest_port, dest_location, dest_zone, url, session_id | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, event_time)`

`cs_fortigate` sourcetype="fortigate_event" $tkn_threat_severity$ dvc=$tkn_threat_fortigate_device|s$ $tkn_threat_logsubtype$ $tkn_threat_search|s$ | rename logdesc as description | table dvc, _time, subtype, severity, description, signature, action, user, src | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time, event_time)`
